knimeNode.name: Molecule String Input (Labs)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Outputs a molecule string in the specified format.

intro.p: Outputs a molecule string in the specified format. The molecule can also be sketched or its string representation be edited in a quick form (KNIME WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web portal.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).
The format of the molecule string. Please note that not all molecule sketchers support all formats.
The value that is selected by default.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined.
If sketcher outputs an SVG it can be retrieved here.
